DataElement.preferredName: Research Activity Or Consortium or Network Professional Organization or Group Type Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the kind of research organization. EXAMPLE(S): cancer center, institute, drug company, clinical center.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Research Activity Or Consortium or Network Professional Organization or Group Type Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Groups of scientists who link their expertise and resources in collaborative efforts to address important questions of shared interest.:A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.
